# Carousel Examples

This document demonstrates the quarto-carousel extension with different syntax options.

## Example 0: Simplest carousels

### Text only

:::: {.carousel}

:::: {.carousel-item}
Slide 1
:::

:::: {.carousel-item}
Slide 2

Multiple lines, too.
:::

:::

### Images only

:::: {.carousel}

:::: {.carousel-item image="assets/imgs/assymetric_laplace.png" caption="Assymetric Laplace"}
:::

:::: {.carousel-item image="assets/imgs/logit_normal.png" caption="Logit Normal"}
:::

:::: {.carousel-item image="assets/imgs/kumaraswamy.png" caption="Kumaraswamy"}
:::
